mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.agentuserid AS "agentuserid", a.agentusername AS "agentusername", a.agentedusername AS "agentedusername", a.agentname AS "agentname"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO flowagent( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, agentuserid, agentusername, agentedusername, agentname ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{agentuserid}, #{agentusername}, #{agentedusername}, #{agentname} )
mapper.update: UPDATE flowagent SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, agentuserid = #{agentuserid}, agentusername = #{agentusername}, agentedusername = #{agentedusername}, agentname = #{agentname} WHERE id = #{id}
